## Random class

Helper with methods to generate random numbers.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Random 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(game)](./bge-core.random._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Random</code> class |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [chance(probability)](./bge-core.random.chance.md) |  | Returns <code>true</code> with the given <code>probability</code>, which is 0.5 by default (50%). |
|  [float()](./bge-core.random.float.md) |  | Generates a uniformly-distributed floating-point number between 0 (inclusive) and 1 (exclusive). |
|  [float(max)](./bge-core.random.float_1.md) |  | Generates a uniformly-distributed floating-point number between 0 (inclusive) and <code>max</code> (exclusive). |
|  [float(min, max)](./bge-core.random.float_2.md) |  | Generates a uniformly-distributed floating-point number between <code>min</code> (inclusive) and <code>max</code> (exclusive). |
|  [int(max)](./bge-core.random.int.md) |  | Generates a uniformly-distributed integer between 0 (inclusive) and <code>max</code> (exclusive). |
|  [int(min, max)](./bge-core.random.int_1.md) |  | Generates a uniformly-distributed integer between <code>min</code> (inclusive) and <code>max</code> (exclusive). |
|  [item(items)](./bge-core.random.item.md) |  | Returns a uniformly selected random item from an array. |
